sentences.en: The sun reflected off the snow-covered mountains.
sentences.cn: 阳光从被雪覆盖的山峦反射回来。

sentences.en: At the northern extreme of the Rift Valley is Mount Hermon, which is the highest point. Mount Hermon is snow-covered.
sentences.cn: 在大裂谷的最北端是黑门山，它是最高点。黑门山被冰雪覆盖。

sentences.en: In a moment, the red glare from the headlight streamed up the snow-covered track before the siding and glittered on the wet, black platform.
sentences.cn: 不一会儿，车头耀眼的红灯照射在月台前被白雪覆盖的铁轨上，湿漉漉、黑幽幽的铁轨闪闪发亮。
